snippet: Despite media speculation to the contrary, Gen. Ashfaq Parvez Kayani confirmed he will step down on Nov. 29, creating an opening for a new army chief.
abstract: Pakistan's army chief Gen Ashfaq Parvez Kayani confirms that he will retire in November 2013, laying to rest media speculation that he will extend his term or take a powerful new position in military.

byline.original: By SALMAN MASOOD and DECLAN WALSH
byline.contributor: Salman Masood reported from Islamabad, and Declan Walsh from London.

lead_paragraph: Despite media speculation to the contrary, Gen. Ashfaq Parvez Kayani confirmed he will step down on Nov. 29, creating an opening for a new army chief.

headline.main: Pakistan Army Chief Says He Will Retire Next Month
headline.print_headline: Pakistan Army Chief Says He Will Retire Next Month
